text: Howdy
Hey how are you today?
I'm good.  You?
Good, What do you think is the greatest social issue we are facing right now?
Violence.  Same as at every point in history.  You ever do one of these chat tasks before?
Yes I have- I feel its violence too
It wants me to donate to "Save the Children".  Any idea if that is a real charity?
I believe it is- I've seen commericals for it on TV before....have you?
No, but then I don't watch much TV, certainly never commercials.  Is it asking you to donate too?
Yes- I've donated to a similar charity before but it was based on supporting kids education
I'm not sure how much my $0.30 reward for completing the HIT would actually help.
It would feed a child for almost 3 days.
Sounds like you are very knowledgeable about it.  It doesn't say that in the info they gave me.  Are you going to donate?
I'm going to donate half .10 - So i Can feed a child for a day
It is only paying you $0.20 complete the HIT?
Its paying me .30
So how is .10 half?
I'm not doing half I'm doing a third.
Ok.  I'll probably just donate the whole 0.30, if you are sure it is real & will help kids.
Yes I am,
